concept.title: View Content Details
concept.shortdesc: View the content details to gather more information about a piece of content before you publish it.

conbody.p: Mouse over a piece of returned content, then select View Details to view more information for an asset.

ul.li: Author information, including the author’s name and username, their number of Posts, Following, and Followers, their location and website (if available), the date on which the Twitter account was created, and a link to the Twitter profile.
Content information, including the source, the date created, the number of Retweets and Likes.
Author information including the author’s name and username, their number of Posts, Following, and Followers, their website (if available), and a link to view their Instagram profile.
Content information including the source, the date created, the number of Likes and Comments, and the image size.

conbody.p: Content already saved to your Asset Library displays its location within the library, and any tags or stars you add.
